bug.short_desc: missing rebuild against gtk3 for f25
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
With f25 i switched MATE desktop (include mate-panel to gtk3). Please rebuild mate-applet-softupd.
See for spec file changes in my coprs Mate gtk3 repo for < f25. http://copr-dist-git.fedorainfracloud.org/cgit/raveit65/Mate-GTK3/mate-applet-softupd.git/commit/?id=7ea280920dec1197e0d4428c06ce64d9c302800a
Hi Wolfgang, Thanks for the "heads up"! I just submitted an update for 23/24/25/rawhide. It should be available in testing soon. I also added your epel test, although I'm not able to test it. Cheers

mate-applet-softupd-0.4.3-1.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-549f275f24
